about: Unleashes a stream of projectiles while encounter channels this spell, which pierce through enemies, dealing lightning damage. When encounter stops channelling, the projectiles explode, dealing significant damage in an area around them. Additional projectiles are added in sequence

Sets a book marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast
Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning
Teleports encounter to random location in an area
